name: Smite Filter
description: Website based on the video game Smite Battleground of the gods where you can filter the selectable characters in the game by letters or role.

name: React Calculator
description: From my first projects using React, a simple calculator with basic operations and a minimalist interface, using only React and Tailwindcss.

name: Cryptocurrency List
description: Web project based on a list of the most famous cryptocurrencies. This project was build on top of the CryptoCompare API using React.

name: Money Converter
description: Web to convert the value of one currency to another. The main goal of the project was to improve the use of APIs using React.

name: Quizz App
description: Web game based on a Quizz, is to answer questions with several options where only one is correct and at the end know our final score.

name: Francesco Pomodoro
description: La técnica Pomodoro es un método para mejorar la administración del tiempo dedicado a una actividad. Fue creado por Francesco Cirillo a fines de la década de 1980.

name: API Joke
description: Web project based on a joke API, The main goal of the project was to improve the use of APIs using React and Javascript.

name: Study Panel
description: Study panel for Web programming. It has a user system using Firebase and stores each of the technologies that you are learning and those learned.

name: Dualsend
description: Program that allows you to send files of any type between a PC and a mobile. You only need to start the server on the machine which has the core of the entire ecosystem, the app being the client with which to interact.

name: Project Manager
description: Manage and manage your projects and tasks in an easy and fast way. The app is the easiest and fastest way to manage your projects and tasks, from simple tasks to important tasks, speeding up your work and increasing your productivity. 1. Creation of projects 2. Task creation 3. Increased productivity 4. Acceleration of work 5. Daily organization 6. Detailed description of tasks and projects 7. Completion of projects and tasks.

name: PokeBook
description: The application has information on each existing Pokemon in all the games of the main saga. Pokedex: A pokedex has a source of accurate and detailed information on each of the pokemon and their abilities, all in one place. Features: PokeBook has a specific search section to easily find the pokemon or ability you want to search for! Have a pokemon filter using their types (Fire, Water, ...etc). The pokedex stores your last searches to avoid forgetting and easy access to previously found pokemon. - Skill Dex - Learn all the information about the skills - Look what pokemon has what abilities - You don't have to worry about forgetting the names of the skills, PokeBook will save it for you - Dex of Types - Filter pokemons by their types to learn more in depth.

name: IP Finder
description: IP Finder app allows you to locate the IP location of any IP address.IP Finder allows you to locate and search any IP anywhere in the world for free. The app provides you with a lot of information about the located IP such as location, time zone, etc.

name: Fran Studios
description: Fran Studios was born from the idea of creating a personal brand on mobile application development. Simple, pleasant apps that solve user problems directly, whether they are tools or entertainment.

name: Cocktails Library
description: Cocktail Recipe App es una aplicación móvil que te ayuda a encontrar recetas de cócteles y recetas de bebidas. Esta aplicación está disponible para dispositivos Android. La aplicación ofrece una amplia gama de recetas de cócteles con la ayuda de las últimas tendencias en bebidas. Estos incluyen tanto cócteles clásicos como nuevos. La aplicación tiene una función de búsqueda que le permite encontrar las bebidas que se adapten a su gusto. Puede guardar sus bebidas favoritas para que pueda acceder a ellas fácilmente cuando sea necesario sin tener que buscar. La aplicación tiene una interfaz simple y limpia. Tiene una barra de búsqueda en la parte superior para encontrar tu bebida favorita. Las bebidas se clasifican por sus ingredientes, el tipo de bebida y el contenido de alcohol. También presenta recetas de bebidas de algunos de los cantineros más reconocidos del mundo, así como muchas otras que seguramente complacerán a cualquiera que disfrute de los cócteles. Esta aplicación es una forma nueva y maravillosa de encontrar rápidamente bebidas perfectas para cualquier ocasión. Es extremadamente fácil de usar. Simplemente escriba algunas palabras clave que describan lo que está buscando. La aplicación de recetas de cócteles es la aplicación perfecta para las personas que aman beber. Es imprescindible para cualquiera que ame beber cócteles y quiera explorar nuevas bebidas. Tiene una enorme base de datos de recetas de cócteles, por lo que nunca te quedarás sin opciones.

name: Login APP
description: Login APP is my first backend project with Typescript, it is a study project where I learned to use a relational database such as SQLite and an ORM as prism, I also wanted to improve my knowledge in typescript. The app is based on a simple login/register with a home where you can create and delete posts, the curious thing about the app is that it has a session cookie so you don't have to log in every time you enter the app.

name: Fran Editor
description: Fran Editor is a Javascript code editor on a web. The code is executed every time a change is made without the need to save and each console.log is reflected in a console on the right side of the editor. The app is built with Monaco Editor, the same editor that VS Code uses

name: PY Calculator
description: When I started studying Python I wanted to create my first project and I decided to create a simple calculator created with the TKinter library.

name: Fran Testing
description: When studying something new I love to know a little bit about how the technologies work and I decided to create a very small testing library with Node.js.

name: Gym Timer
description: Web timer for exercise, with which you can establish simple routines and much more complex with the series nesting system.

name: Login Simulation
description: My first project using PHP and MySQL, is based on a simple but effective login system with a simple and quite minimalist interface.

name: PHP Calculator
description: Being new to a language I love to make a simple calculator, in order to familiarize myself with the language in the most popular way.

name: Task list CRUD
description: Basic task list created with PHP, MySQL and Bootstrap that aimed to improve CRUD skills using the PHP language.

name: Users API
description: Public Web API built with Laravel PHP, it is based on a random user API for rapid application development or testing much like JSON Placeholder.

name: Skywind
description: Skywind makes it easy to create web pages with Server Side Rendering and Javascript. Its simplicity and low dependencies allow it to be run on any node server. Skywind allows you to granulate your pages into small components that can be reused anywhere on your website.It has a very intuitive, powerful and easy to learn routing system, it also allows you to create APIs using node's HTTP module.

name: Snake Game
description: Classic snake game programmed using Object Oriented Programming, Typescript and pure CSS for a more Vanilla experience.

name: Vue Manager
description: Simple task list and first project using Vue.js. Created with the goal of learning new frameworks and libraries and improve skills like Firebase and Tailwindcss.

name: E-commerce App
description: Fully functional E-commerce app using Typescript and Firebase. Minimalist design and easy to use. Perfect and ready to use for your online store.
